fields.description:
*Assessment*

When deploying an ASG on a multi-cluster subnet Eucalyptus cloud using Cloudformation, the following error occurs:
{code}
[root@g-22-04 ~]# euform-describe-stacks MultiAZStack --region sales-admin@
STACK  	MultiAZStack   	ROLLBACK_COMPLETE      		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack in Eucalyptus VPC 	2016-09-07T19:02:36.273Z
PARAMETER      	ImageId		emi-d978f0ca
PARAMETER      	KeyName		sales-admin
PARAMETER      	InstanceType   		m1.small
PARAMETER      	MinSize		2
PARAMETER      	MaxSize		4

[root@g-22-04 ~]# euform-describe-stack-events  MultiAZStack --region sales-admin@
....
EVENT  	MultiAZStack   	f2825732-7b11-48c9-ba20-3789e790e581   	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack     	MultiAZStack   	arn:aws:cloudformation::002598321247:stack/MultiAZStack/fc7cdeaa-2601-4682-b65a-a9226204cd78      	2016-09-07T19:03:16.724Z       	ROLLBACK_IN_PROGRESS   	Create stack failed.  Rollback requested by user.
EVENT  	MultiAZStack   	67bdcf19-4c83-4e1b-bf2d-ee5f9f7d5726   	AWS::CloudFormation::Stack     	MultiAZStack   	arn:aws:cloudformation::002598321247:stack/MultiAZStack/fc7cdeaa-2601-4682-b65a-a9226204cd78      	2016-09-07T19:02:57.074Z       	CREATE_FAILED  	The following resource(s) failed to create: [AutoScalingGroup].
EVENT  	MultiAZStack   	AutoScalingGroup-CREATE_FAILED-1473274976229   	AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup     	AutoScalingGroup       		2016-09-07T19:02:56.229Z  	CREATE_FAILED  	Invalid parameters [Found multiple subnets for availability zone(s) ]
EVENT  	MultiAZStack   	AutoScalingGroup-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1473274975405      	AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup     	AutoScalingGroup       		2016-09-07T19:02:55.405Z  	CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
...
{code}
The same template used on AWS deployed successfully:
{code}
euca-prod-1-82:~ haroldspencerjr$ aws cloudformation describe-stacks --profile hspencer-personal --stack-name NginxStack
STACKS 	2016-09-07T18:50:26.761Z       	CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack in Eucalyptus VPC 	False  	arn:aws:cloudformation:us-east-1:986451091583:stack/NginxStack/f0ed0ed0-752b-11e6-b698-500c28903236       	NginxStack     	CREATE_COMPLETE
OUTPUTS	ELB DNS Name for Nginx Cluster 	ELBURL 	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-1D2KE2T1M3EX1-2073546566.us-east-1.elb.amazonaws.com
PARAMETERS     	KeyName	hspencer-test
PARAMETERS     	MinSize	2
PARAMETERS     	ImageId	ami-a8137dbf
PARAMETERS     	InstanceType   	m3.medium
PARAMETERS     	MaxSize	4
{code}

*Signs*

* Template used for stack attached
* Entire stack event output for both Eucalyptus and AWS are below in the comments.
fields.summary: Auto Scaling:  Add ability to specify more than one subnet per AZ in an ASG

[~hspencer], I would guess the issue is that since the zone is not specified for the subnets we sometimes end up with two subnets in the same zone, which we do not support (in autoscaling)

AWS had the same limitation, but it looks like this may have changed:

  https://forums.aws.amazon.com/ann.jspa?annID=2927

though it could be the case that the same template fails sometimes in AWS depending on which zones end up being used for the subnets.
[~hspencer], please try to reproduce with specifying the AZs
